author: Pon Vasanth Arunachalam
text:
Grievance meeting

The monthly farmers’ grievance day meeting for January will be held at the Madurai Collector’s office on Friday.

A communiqué from the Collector’s office said that the meeting, to be headed by Collector L. Subramanian, would commence at 11 a.m.

The statement further said that individual farmers with grievances could submit a petition directly to the Collector.
title: Farmers’ grievance meeting
